channel.title: Editing charater file
channel.description:
Okay so i added in chaotic rapier and Im adding in charges [IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk226/chad0ck/helpme.png[/img] [IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk226/chad0ck/charges-1.png[/img] I want to edit my charater files to start out with 1000% and decrease to 0% [IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk226/chad0ck/8percent.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk226/chad0ck/help2.png[/img] Any help??

item.title: Editing charater file
item.dc:creator: @pickle_boy4 pickle boy4
item.description:
@pickle_boy4 wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:6, topic:392989”][quote author=pickle boy4 link=topic=490157.msg3584125#msg3584125 date=1304032055]

when you do your – to your charges does it check to see if the code is 0?

if (charges > 0) {
  charges --;
   if (charges < 0) {
       charges = 0;
   }
}

Okay i want the charges to be default at 1,000.
When you attack you loose so much and finally you get to 0 where it will take the stats away from the weapon and it will put your charges back up at 1,000 when that happens.
i just need to know how to edit the default charater file, so lets say i started a new account on my server. by default it will have 0 charges right? I want to change it to 1,000.
[/quote]

It will only start at 0 if you tell it to.[/quote]

But where do i find that code thats telling it to start at 0?
Playersave.java I have this coded.
} else if (token.equals("chargesleft")) { p.chargespercent = Integer.parseInt(token2);

characterfile.write("chargespercent = "); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.chargespercent ), 0, Integer.toString(p.chargespercent).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Read full topic

item.title: Editing charater file
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“pickle boy4, post:5, topic:392989”][quote author=Ddragonimp link=topic=490157.msg3584119#msg3584119 date=1304031871]
when you do your – to your charges does it check to see if the code is 0?

if (charges > 0) {
  charges --;
   if (charges < 0) {
       charges = 0;
   }
}

[/quote]

Okay i want the charges to be default at 1,000.
When you attack you loose so much and finally you get to 0 where it will take the stats away from the weapon and it will put your charges back up at 1,000 when that happens.
i just need to know how to edit the default charater file, so lets say i started a new account on my server. by default it will have 0 charges right? I want to change it to 1,000.[/quote]

It will only start at 0 if you tell it to.

Read full topic

@pickle_boy4 wrote:

[quote=“Ddragonimp, post:4, topic:392989”]when you do your – to your charges does it check to see if the code is 0?

if (charges > 0) { charges --; if (charges < 0) { charges = 0; } } [/quote]

Okay i want the charges to be default at 1,000.
When you attack you loose so much and finally you get to 0 where it will take the stats away from the weapon and it will put your charges back up at 1,000 when that happens.
i just need to know how to edit the default charater file, so lets say i started a new account on my server. by default it will have 0 charges right? I want to change it to 1,000.

item.title: Editing charater file
item.dc:creator: @pickle_boy4 pickle boy4
item.description:
@pickle_boy4 wrote:

zyle1992:

Chances are, the code you added decreases the value, but doesn’t check if it’s reached 0, so it keeps decreasing.

c.chargespercent = 1000;

Read full topic
